mapper.select: select u.*, (SELECT r.`name` FROM sys_region AS r WHERE r.id = u.region_id) AS regionName, (SELECT e.enterprise_name FROM enterprise AS e WHERE e.id = u.enterprise_id) AS enterpriseName from sys_user AS u where user_id = #{value}

select id,username name,dept_Id from sys_user WHERE 1=1
AND username LIKE concat('%',#{name},'%')
select m.perms from sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm on ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu m on rm.menu_id = m.menu_id where ur.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_user ( `user_id`, `username`, `password`, `email`, `mobile`, `status`, `create_user_id`, `dept_id`, `create_time`, `realname`, `update_time`, `update_user_id`, identify, superior, certificate_url, enterprise_id, region_id ) values ( #{userId}, #{username}, #{password}, #{email}, #{mobile}, #{status}, #{createUserId}, #{deptId}, #{createTime}, #{realname}, #{updateTime}, #{updateUserId}, #{identify}, #{superior}, #{certificateUrl}, #{enterpriseId}, #{regionId} )
mapper.update: update sys_user set `password` = #{newPassword} where user_id = #{userId} and password = #{password}
